name: FullContact, Inc.
description: Developer of an identity resolution management platform intended to provide personalized connections between people and brands. The company's platform provides a smart cloud-based address book for users that transforms partial identities into complete profiles in order to connect with prospects and capture audience insights, enabling clients to resolve and enrich contact records for enhanced customer experience and authentic customer engagement.
one_liner: Developer of an identity resolution management platform intended to provide personalized connections between people and brands. The company's platform provides a smart cloud-based address book for users that transforms partial identities into complete profiles in order to connect with prospects and capture audience insights, enabling clients to resolve and enrich contact records for enhanced customer experience and authentic customer engagement.
